name: Mar Ball Red
description:
Are you able to manage to deal with all the Killer Entities and Damage Factors, collect all necessary items, navigating through a narrow paths and finishing the Level before your time runs out ?

Do you have steady control of your fingers to navigate your Player through these dangerous and challenging places without being killed by the enemies ?

Every Level has its own specific Time period to reach the end of the Level .

* GAMEPLAY

- You need to be fast, move swiftly and DON'T PANIC ! 

- There is no LIVES or SAVE CHECKPOINTS in this Game. If you lose at any spot of the Level, you will need to start again from the beginning of the Level ( the current Level ) ;

- Training Level available, so you can learn and get used to the Controls and the game objects, enemies etc ;

- Bonus Level available for relaxing. In this Level you will not face any Damaging actors, only collect as many items as possible in a certain period of time .

CREATED IN : Unreal Engine 4.26.2 ( entirely in Blueprints ) .

Game Status : Full Version ;

ADS : NO ;

In Game purchases : NO ;

 Scanned for Viruses and Threads : YES ( Avira Antivirus Pro ) ;

Optimized for Laptop, Desktop, Tablet : YES ( Max Res : 1920x1080 ) ;

Controls : Keyboard only ;

Location : Stockholm, Sweden .
